description: This file is the entry point for client-side hydration in a Remix application using React. It imports necessary components and functions, and initiates the hydration process for the app.

methods.name: startTransition
methods.description: Starts a React transition to handle non-urgent updates, used here for client rendering.

methods.name: hydrateRoot
methods.description: Hydrates the React app into the DOM, replacing the existing server-rendered markup.
